meanings.definition: A traditional Indian garment worn by men, consisting of a long piece of cloth wrapped around the waist and legs.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his dhotis during the cultural festival.
meanings.sent2: In India, many men prefer to wear dhotis on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The dhotis decided to take a walk around the city on their own!
meanings.sent4: His dhotis were like a shield, protecting him from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of his dhotis caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various styles of dhotis for sale.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, all the men wore their traditional dhotis.
meanings.sent3: The dhotis in the store seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The stack of dhotis resembled a colorful mountain in the room.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling dhotis of different fabrics.
